RealType lambda() const;

Returns the {{math|Î»}} distribution parameter the distribution was constructed with. The parameter defines the rate of events, per unit. The default value is {{c|1.0}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Floating point value identifying the rate of events per unit.
